# bmlt_formats (Data Source)

Formats data source allows you to retrieve information about available meeting formats.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "bmlt_formats" "all" {}

# Access format information
output "format_count" {
  value = length(data.bmlt_formats.all.formats)
}

output "format_names" {
  value = [for format in data.bmlt_formats.all.formats :
    format.translations[0].name if length(format.translations) > 0
  ]
}
```

- `formats` (Attributes List) List of formats (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--formats))

<a id="nestedatt--formats"></a>
### Nested Schema for `formats`

Read-Only:

- `id` (Number) Format identifier
- `translations` (Attributes List) Format translations (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--formats--translations))
- `type` (String) Format type
- `world_id` (String) World identifier for the format

<a id="nestedatt--formats--translations"></a>
### Nested Schema for `formats.translations`

Read-Only:

- `description` (String) Format description
- `key` (String) Translation key
- `language` (String) Language code
- `name` (String) Format name
